name: Pedro Augusto Monteiro Delgado
bio: Computer Science undergraduate at ICMC-USP, in an exchange program with the University of Bern, Switzerland. Interested in exploring the application of artificial intelligence tools in areas of public interest, such as health and education.

name: Cecília Nunes Sedenho
bio: Undergraduate student in Computer Science at ICMC - USP and researcher in the area of data architecture. Interested in areas related to Data Engineering and Machine Learning.

name: Gabriel Merlin
bio: His interests fit in the ML/DL area, especially involving Time Series.

name: Lucas de Souza Brandão
bio: Computer Science student at the University of São Paulo. Undergraduate-level researcher focusing on Data Science.

name: Samuel Rubens Souza Oliveira
bio: Professional with experience in software development, infrastructure automation, and distributed systems. Specialist in microservices architecture, Kubernetes, and DevOps, with expertise in Go, TypeScript, Terraform, and cloud platforms.

name: Pedro Lucas Bahiense
bio: Computer Science student at the University of São Paulo.

name: Pedro Augusto Ribeiro Gomes
bio: Founder and President of RAIA, studying Computer Science at ICMC - USP São Carlos.

name: Luísa Shimabucoro
bio: Interested in ML areas, with emphasis on NLP and Vision. Computer Science student at USP, having worked at the University of Edinburgh and Cohere For AI as a researcher.

name: Pedro Kenzo Muramatsu
bio: Former Co-President, current Advisor of RAIA. Distributed Computing Engineer at CERN and incoming Backend SWE II at QuintoAndar. BsC Computer Science @ ICMC USP, full-ride research exchange @ Kyushu University
education: University of São Paulo (USP), Kyushu University
